    boolean
    checkNum(Game game)
    checks if the number of pawns on an entrance is more then 4 if the players are 2 or 4 more then 5 if the players are 3 this check allows to know if the pawns moved in a turn are less or more then that required

    • checkNum

      public boolean checkNum(Game game)
      checks if the number of pawns on an entrance is more then 4 if the players are 2 or 4 more then 5 if the players are 3 this check allows to know if the pawns moved in a turn are less or more then that required
      Returns:
      boolean true or false

    • movePawnToIsland

      public void movePawnToIsland(ColorPawn colorPawn, Island island, Game game)
      it allows to move the pawns from the entrance to the island selected
      Parameters:
      island - is the island selected

      invokes the function MovePawnToIsland
      Parameters:
      n - number of Pawns
      colorPawn - array with Pawns

    • chooseCloud

      public void chooseCloud(Cloud cloud, Game game, Player player)
